trans-unit.source: Contains a set of static properties that returns strings that represent security token types.
Use SecurityTokenTypes to specify the security token type that must be included in a SOAP message sent by a client or required by a service.
To specify the security token type requirement, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> property.
Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.

The two types of security tokens that are based on a Kerberos ticket are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>.
A string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.
Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> security token is based upon an RSA key.
A string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.
Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token is based upon a SAML assertion.
A string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.
Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token is based upon a user name and password.
A string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.
Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token is based upon an X.509 certificate.
A string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
